response.overview: After her father’s death, police officer Pepe is drawn back to her hometown, where a string of ritual murders exposes deep fractures in her family and community. Her investigation pits her against corrupt law enforcement, powerful local figures, and a feared vigilante group—only to uncover a devastating link between the killings and those she once trusted. As betrayal and supernatural visions close in, Pepe must embrace her spiritual gifts to survive and bring the truth to light. A tense blend of crime thriller and mysticism, the film explores faith, justice, and redemption in a town gripped by fear.
response.title: Black Pepper
